Player History
Had first career hit on 4/1/2002, off Aaron Fultz (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/2002, off Juan Cruz (CLE)...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2002...
Injured on 7/26/2006 with a Fractured Knee, out for 5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Minnesota on 7/12/2007...
Won World Series with Seattle in 2007...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/27/2008 to a 3-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Injured on 6/3/2009 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 3/1/2011 to a minor league contract.
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 2013...
Injured on 7/21/2013 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/18/2016 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/5/2017, off Donnie Joseph (SEA)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 2018...
Injured on 6/16/2020 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Drafted in 3rd round, 41st overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1978...
